posts.post_title: 19 T206 Sgc Graded (18 SGC 40s & 1 SGC A)
posts.post_content:
All cards listed are priced including shipping. Feel free to pay by Check/Money Order or Paypal (no fee). Feel free to make offers on groups (I am also offering a 10% discount on groups of 5 or more).

Trades would also be entertained for certain Baseball, Football or Hockey Hall of Famers e-mail me if you want to trade.

Front and backs of The George Brown can be seen by [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/t206/"]clicking here[/URL]

My scanner stopped working last night but I have a buddy scanning them now - once those scans are available I will have them posted
